content: Creation based on several files and folders is not available for this type of room. To create such a room, go to the Rooms section or use one of the PDF forms.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a warning message displayed when attempting to create a room based on multiple files and folders. It informs users that this feature is not available and provides alternative options to proceed. This text appears as a tooltip or alert in the Create Edit Room Dialog component, specifically when selecting a certain room type.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Creation based on several files and folders" is somewhat awkwardly translated as "Създаването на базата на няколко файла и папки". A more natural translation might be "Създаването въз основа на няколко файла и папки" or "Създаването с използване на няколко файла и папки". "Базата на" isn't the most common phrasing in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Създаването въз основа на няколко файла и папки

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To create such a room" is translated as "Para crear una sala de este tipo". While grammatically correct, it's a bit clunky and doesn't flow as naturally in Spanish. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Para crear este tipo de sala...' or 'Para crear salas de este tipo...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para crear este tipo de sala...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "PDF forms" should ideally be rendered as "formularios PDF" to maintain consistency in the Spanish translation and clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: formularios PDF

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Useisiin tiedostoihin ja kansioihin perustuva luonti ei ole käytössä tämäntyyppisessä huoneessa" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Creation based on several files and folders is not available for this type of room." It literally translates to "Creation based on several files and folders is not in use in this type of room."  A more accurate translation would emphasize the *availability* is the issue.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tässä huonetyypissä tiedostojen ja kansioiden pohjalta tapahtuva luonti ei ole mahdollista.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The suggestion to "copy one {{ organizationName }} PDF form at a time" is not a direct translation of the English and doesn't explain the alternative method of creating the room. It implies a workaround rather than a proper solution.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Voit luoda sellaisen huoneen siirtymällä Huoneet-osioon tai käyttämällä PDF-lomakkeita.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The suggestion of copying PDF forms is a workaround, but the original English text suggests going to the 'Rooms' section is a proper alternative. This alternative isn't fully captured in the current Finnish translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a phrase like: 'tai siirry Huoneet-osioon' (or go to the Rooms section).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Creation based on several files and folders" is somewhat awkwardly translated. "Ստեղծումը հիմնված" literally means 'creation based on'. A more natural translation would be something like "Ֆայլերի և թղթապանակների օգտագործմամբ սենյակ ստեղծելը..." (Creating a room using files and folders...).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մի քանի ֆայլերի և թղթապանակների օգտագործմամբ սենյակ ստեղծելը հասանելի չէ այս տեսակի սենյակների համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence breaks are slightly awkward. It may be more readable to break it into two shorter sentences.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մի քանի ֆայլերի և թղթապանակների օգտագործմամբ սենյակ ստեղծելը հասանելի չէ այս տեսակի սենյակների համար։ Նման սենյակ ստեղծելու համար անցեք Սենյակներ բաժին կամ օգտագործեք PDF ձևերից մեկը։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To create such a room' is not accurately translated. 'Such a room' implies a specific room type previously mentioned. A more natural translation would be 'una stanza simile' or 'una stanza di questo genere'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Per creare una stanza simile/una stanza di questo genere

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'based on several files and folders' is translated as '여러 파일 및 폴더를 기반으로 하는'. While technically correct, it's a bit awkward in Korean. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning but sound less stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이 유형의 룸에서는 여러 파일 및 폴더를 사용하여 생성이 불가능합니다. (This type of room cannot be created using several files and folders.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit long and complex for a user interface message. Breaking it down might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이 유형의 룸에서는 여러 파일 및 폴더를 사용할 수 없습니다. 이러한 룸을 생성하려면 룸 섹션으로 이동하거나 PDF 양식 중 하나를 사용하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Creation based on several files and folders" is not accurately translated. 'ການສ້າງພື້ນຖານອີງຕາມເອກະສານແລະໂຟນເດີ' is a bit clunky and doesn't perfectly convey the meaning. A more natural translation would focus on 'creating a room using files and folders'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການສ້າງຫ້ອງໂດຍໃຊ້ເອກະສານ ແລະ ໂຟນເດີ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be slightly improved for better flow. Separating the instructions for creating the room might enhance readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການສ້າງຫ້ອງໂດຍອີງຕາມເອກະສານແລະໂຟນເດີບໍ່ສາມາດເຮັດໄດ້ສໍາລັບປະເພດຫ້ອງນີ້. ຖ້າຕ້ອງການສ້າງຫ້ອງແບບນີ້, ກະລຸນາເຂົ້າໄປທີ່ສ່ວນຫ້ອງ ຫຼືໃຊ້ແບບຟອມ PDF ຫນຶ່ງໃນນັ້ນ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "creation based on several files and folders" is slightly awkward in Portuguese. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Criação a partir de múltiplos arquivos e pastas

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "seção Salas" is a bit abrupt. A more fluid connection to the previous phrase would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para criar um quarto como este, vá para a seção 'Salas' ou utilize um dos formulários PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Creation based on several files and folders' is not accurately translated. 'Crearea bazată pe mai multe fișiere sau foldere' is a literal translation but sounds awkward in Romanian. A more natural translation would be 'Crearea unei săli pe baza mai multor fișiere și foldere'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Crearea unei săli pe baza mai multor fișiere și foldere

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'Pentru crearea unei astfel de sală' is redundant and grammatically incorrect. 'Pentru crearea unei astfel de săli' is better. Alternatively, rephrasing to 'Pentru a crea o astfel de sală' is more fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru a crea o astfel de sală

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'sală' is used repeatedly.  While correct, using 'camera' instead of 'sală' might sound more appropriate in a technical context, though 'sală' is also acceptable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'sală' with 'cameră' in some instances for a slightly more refined tone.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "такую" (such a) appears twice. While not incorrect, it can be slightly improved for fluency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Создание на основе нескольких файлов и папок недоступно для комнаты этого типа. Чтобы создать комнату такого типа, перейдите в раздел "Комнаты" или воспользуйтесь одной из PDF-форм.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ආකෘති' (aakruththi) is a more formal and potentially less common way to say 'forms' in this context. 'ආකාර' (akaara) might be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම වර්ගයේ කාමරයක් නිර්මාණය කිරීමට, කාමර කොටසට යන්න හෝ PDF ආකාර වලින් එකක් භාවිතා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'එවැනි කාමරයක් නිර්මාණය කිරීමට' (evethi kamarayak nirmanaya karamito) is grammatically correct but can be slightly rephrased for better flow. Using 'එවැනි කාමරයක් සාදා ගැනීමට' (evethi kamarayak sadaya gnetuwa) may sound more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම වර්ගයේ කාමරයක් සඳහා බොහෝ ගොනු සහ ෆෝල්ඩර් මත පදනම් වූ නිර්මාණය නොමැත. එවැනි කාමරයක් සාදා ගැනීමට, කාමර කොටසට යන්න හෝ PDF ආකෘති වලින් එකක් භාවිතා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Creation based on several files and folders' is not accurately reflected by 'Ustvarjanje na podlagi več datotek in map'. A more accurate translation would convey the idea of creating a room *using* or *with* files and folders, rather than the creation itself being based on them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ustvarjanje sobe z uporabo več datotek in map...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'PDF forms' could be improved for clarity.  'Obrazcev PDF' isn't the most natural way to express this.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: PDF obrazcev

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Creation based on several files and folders" is not perfectly conveyed by "Креирање засновано на више фајлова и фолдера." A more natural translation might be "Процес креирања на основу више фајлова и фолдера..." or "Могућност креирања на основу..."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Процес креирања на основу више фајлова и фолдера није доступно за ову врсту собе.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'room' is translated as 'soba' which is generally correct, but contextually 'просторија' might be more appropriate depending on the specific meaning of 'room' in the application. However, 'soba' is acceptable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, 'soba' is acceptable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Creation based on several files and folders' is not perfectly conveyed. 'Kreiranje zasnovano na više fajlova i foldera' is a literal translation, but sounds slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing might be 'Omogućeno je kreiranje samo na osnovu...' or 'Kreiranje sa više fajlova i foldera nije podržano...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kreiranje sa više fajlova i foldera nije podržano za ovu vrstu sobe. Da biste kreirali takvu sobu, idite na odeljak Sobe ili koristite jedan od PDF obrazaca.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Creation based on several files and folders' is translated as 'birkaç dosya ve klasöre dayalı oluşturma'. While technically correct, it's a bit awkward in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would be 'birkaç dosya ve klasör içeren'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu tür bir oda için birkaç dosya ve klasör içeren oluşturma mevcut değildir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a full stop at the end of the sentence. While not incorrect, consistent use of a full stop or a simpler sentence ending (e.g., an ellipsis) might be better for user interface text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu tür bir oda için birkaç dosya ve klasöre dayalı oluşturma mevcut değildir... (or) Bu tür bir oda için birkaç dosya ve klasöre dayalı oluşturma mevcut değildir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Створення на основі кількох файлів і папок недоступне" is a bit clunky. A more natural Ukrainian phrasing would be "Можливість створення на основі кількох файлів і папок недоступна".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можливість створення на основі кількох файлів і папок недоступна

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "một số tập tin" (some files) is a literal translation of "several files."  While technically correct, it might sound a bit awkward in Vietnamese.  A more natural phrasing would be "nhiều tập tin."  Similarly, "một trong các biểu mẫu PDF" is technically correct but slightly clunky; "một biểu mẫu PDF" is more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Việc tạo dựa trên nhiều tập tin và thư mục không khả dụng cho loại phòng này. Để tạo một phòng như vậy, hãy chuyển đến phần Phòng hoặc sử dụng một biểu mẫu PDF.
